title: This toxic player is a terrible human being,
body: I wouldnt post this if he didnt try to keep adding me after the game that he didnt stop talking in, but this is way too far, anyone else have an issue with this kind of people??

replies.body: Just an FYI i have not had an encounter with a person like this in a whole year, i said people with his attitude should be in prison, not dead.
Tony abbott should be in prison

ive just had this person none stop talking crap and being toxic for a whole game, he then logged onto his supposed "Main" account and then messaged me with this "[10:09PM] Zeus Slayer : sup cocksucker
nice rank dipshit
u dumb  fucking bronze cockhead rofl 
worst rrank in the game over 600 ranked games fucking obese sad fuck of a life so bad anyway laters fuckwit"

i found this to be very rude, and unwarrented he was having a go at everyone that i duo'ed with Names are : BunnyMcFluff and MrmcFluffykins.

If you could please do something about this insulting person. i can gather other messages he sent to them if you require them.

I blocked him straight away lol, no need to be rude spectre... what i also find is that it doesnt really help much, and usually in a normal game these people will just feed wasting my time because they remember my name (not real easy to forget lol)
